name: The 5th Int'l Conference on Nursing and Healthcare
content: The 5th Int'l Conference on Nursing and Healthcare (ICNH 2024) will be held during July 19-21, 2024 in Xi'an, China. This prestigious conference aims to assemble experts and scholars from around the globe to discuss and explore various essential topics, including Acute/Critical Care, Adult Health Nursing, Advanced Nursing Science, Clinical Nursing, Nursing Management, Health Sciences, Healthcare Education, Healthcare Information Technology, Healthcare Technologies, Intelligent Technologies for Healthcare, Internet of Things for Healthcare, and much more.
